Text:
Episode order is NOT quite what it should be... I tried to watch what is labelled as Episode 2 "Crossing The Atlantic" but what you get is actually Episode 3.

Shame really. Thanks for uploading, but if you could re-upload with stuff in the right order...

Currently downloading (and will be seeding for some time!) http://thepiratebay.org/torrent/4609975/The_Mysterious_Cities_of_Gold which looks to be a better bet.
